faq1.question: What are credits and how are they used?
faq1.answer: Text-to-image uses 1 credit, image-to-image uses 2 credits. Credits are automatically recharged at the start of each billing cycle - monthly plans recharge monthly, annual plans receive the full year's allocation upfront (1 USD = 10 credits).

faq2.question: Can I change my plan anytime?
faq2.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Upgrades take effect immediately, while downgrades will take effect in the next billing cycle.

faq3.question: Do unused credits roll over?
faq3.answer: Monthly plan credits do not roll over to the next month. Annual plan credits are valid for the entire subscription period. We recommend choosing a plan based on your actual usage needs.

faq4.question: What payment methods are supported?
faq4.answer: We support credit cards, debit cards, Alipay, WeChat Pay, and other payment methods. All payments are processed through secure third-party payment platforms.

faq5.question: How many credits does video generation consume?
faq5.answer: Video generation consumes credits based on duration: 4-second videos consume 40 credits, 6-second videos consume 60 credits, and 8-second videos consume 80 credits. All plans support video generation and offer multiple resolution options (720p/1080p).
